summary: Mobile responsiveness testing completed successfully. All key pages (Login, Dashboard, Bookings, Clients, Vendors, Users, WhatsApp) render correctly on mobile viewport (393x852). Dialogs display as bottom sheets that slide up from the bottom with rounded top corners. Mobile navigation menu shows a 4-column grid of navigation items. Form inputs are properly sized for touch (44px height). Theme selector is accessible in the mobile header.

issues: News/research text snippets use 10-10.5px font size which is intentionally compact but may be slightly small for some users

context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile responsiveness fully tested at 393x852 viewport (iPhone 14 Pro). All dialogs use bottom sheet pattern with sm: prefix for max-width classes. Mobile header contains: PRIVITY logo, version badge, PE status indicator, notification bell, theme selector, and hamburger menu. Mobile sidebar slides in from right with 4-column navigation grid.

login_page.notes: Login form renders correctly, inputs are touch-friendly

dashboard.notes: Stats cards display correctly, quick action buttons visible, AI assistant card renders well

mobile_header.notes: PRIVITY logo, version badge, PE status indicator, notification bell, theme selector, hamburger menu all visible

mobile_menu.notes: Hamburger menu opens slide-over panel from right, 4-column navigation grid with 35 menu items, logout button at bottom

bookings_page.notes: Page renders correctly, Create Booking button visible

create_booking_dialog.notes: Dialog shows as bottom sheet (full width 393px, slides up from bottom), form inputs are 44px height (touch-friendly)

clients_page.notes: Page renders correctly, Add Client button visible

add_client_dialog.notes: Dialog shows as bottom sheet with step indicator (1-2-3 wizard), full width on mobile

vendors_page.notes: Page renders correctly, Add Vendor button visible

add_vendor_dialog.notes: Dialog shows as bottom sheet, full width on mobile, tabs for Details/Documents

users_page.notes: Page renders correctly, Add User button visible

add_user_dialog.notes: Dialog shows as bottom sheet, full width on mobile

theme_selector.notes: Theme selector button visible in mobile header (shows current theme icon + palette icon)

form_inputs.notes: All form inputs are 44px height (touch-friendly), 14/14 inputs tested passed

text_readability.notes: Main UI text is readable. News/research snippets use smaller font (10-10.5px) which is intentional for compact display

desktop_styles.max_width: sm:max-w-lg (default), can be overridden per dialog
